name: Kokoro's Doki-Doki Sabbatical
description:
Hata no Kokoro goes on a pleasant stroll through Gensokyo on a cool autumn morning... but little does the spunky young menriki know, her path will be filled with a colorful cast of characters, some hard conversations and the concept of love!

Based on ideas from life and dating simulators such as Needy Streamer Overload, Coffee Talk and VA11-HALLA, Kokoro's Doki-Doki Sabbatical asks the user to properly read the action in front of them and choose answers which fit the situation in the hopes of discovering more about both yourself and the people you meet along the way.

So what else can you expect!?

  • Five encounters with various beloved characters from the Touhou Project!
  • Eight alternate endings!
  • A dynamic relationship system!
  • Hours of gameplay!
  • Cool music and art!
  • ... And more!?

Controls and credits are in the start menu.
